name: splitView(_:effectiveRect:forDrawnRect:ofDividerAt:)
desc: Allows the delegate to modify the rectangle where mouse clicks initiate divider dragging.
declaration:
optional func splitView(_ splitView: NSSplitView, 
          effectiveRect proposedEffectiveRect: NSRect, 
           forDrawnRect drawnRect: NSRect, 
            ofDividerAt dividerIndex: Int) -> NSRect
